administering_body: Chief Fiscal Officer of the State
description: Establishes the **Accountability Court Fund** as a trust fund on the books of the Treasurer of State, Auditor of State and Chief Fiscal Officer of the State.  The fund shall consist of grants made by any person or federal government agency and any other funds authorized by law and shall be used by the Administrative Office of the Courts for adult and juvenile specialty court programs.  Distribution is governed by a formula developed by the Arkansas Judicial Council, reviewed by the Specialty Court Program Advisory Committee and approved by the Legislative Council【178441333792595†L70-L83】.
